title: Metric Provenance Map - Deterministic vs Inferred Labeling
description: Explicit separation of deterministic vs inferred outputs on every Part B card. Provenance is derived from actual repo implementation (deterministic calculators vs model outputs vs composite synthesis).

DERIVED_FORMULA.description: Calculated using deterministic formula from measured inputs
DERIVED_FORMULA.examples: eGFR (CKD-EPI), anion gap, BMI, non-HDL cholesterol

CONSTRAINED_INFERENCE.description: Inferred using Bayesian constraint satisfaction with physiological bounds
CONSTRAINED_INFERENCE.examples: Estimated HbA1c, insulin resistance probability, LDL pattern proxy

MODEL_ASSISTED_SYNTHESIS.description: Synthesized using ML-assisted integration of multiple physiological signals
MODEL_ASSISTED_SYNTHESIS.examples: Allostatic load, metabolic flexibility, chronic inflammation index

estimated_hba1c_range.rationale: Estimated from continuous glucose patterns using population-validated mapping

insulin_resistance_probability.rationale: Inferred from glucose patterns, anthropometrics, and physiological constraints

metabolic_flexibility_score.rationale: Composite score integrating glucose-lactate coupling and fuel-switching patterns

postprandial_dysregulation_phenotype.rationale: Classified from postprandial glucose excursion patterns

prediabetes_trajectory_class.rationale: Trajectory classification from longitudinal glucose trends

ldl_pattern_risk_proxy.rationale: Estimated using glucose-lipid metabolism coupling with population priors

hdl_functional_likelihood.rationale: Estimated from activity/vitals patterns as HDL functional proxy

triglyceride_elevation_probability.rationale: Probability model using glucose-TG coupling and metabolic patterns

atherogenic_risk_phenotype.rationale: Multi-system phenotype classification integrating metabolic and CV signals

cardiometabolic_risk_score.rationale: Framingham-style composite risk score from multiple CV and metabolic inputs

vitamin_d_sufficiency_likelihood.rationale: Estimated using population priors conditioned on demographics and season

b12_functional_adequacy_score.rationale: Estimated from dietary patterns and population priors

iron_utilization_status_class.rationale: Classified using symptom proxies and demographic priors

magnesium_adequacy_proxy.rationale: Estimated from symptom proxies and dietary assessment

micronutrient_risk_summary.rationale: Composite summary aggregating individual micronutrient signals

chronic_inflammation_index.rationale: Composite index integrating symptom proxies and autonomic markers

acute_vs_chronic_pattern_classifier.rationale: Temporal pattern classification from symptom duration and onset

cortisol_rhythm_integrity_score.rationale: Circadian proxy from diurnal vitals patterns and sleep quality

thyroid_functional_pattern.rationale: Pattern classification from metabolic rate proxies and symptoms

sympathetic_dominance_index.rationale: Autonomic balance index from HRV analysis and vitals patterns

autonomic_status.rationale: Autonomic state classification from HR, HRV, and BP patterns

egfr_trajectory_class.rationale: Calculated using CKD-EPI equation from creatinine, age, sex, race

renal_stress_index.rationale: Composite index integrating renal markers and hemodynamic stress

hydration_status.rationale: Classified from vitals patterns and subjective hydration markers

dehydration_driven_creatinine_elevation_.rationale: Probability model using BUN/Cr ratio and hydration status

electrolyte_regulation_efficiency_score.rationale: Estimated from anion gap and electrolyte balance proxies

allostatic_load_proxy.rationale: Multi-system stress composite aggregating metabolic, CV, inflammatory, HPA

homeostatic_resilience_score.rationale: Resilience score from homeostatic variability across multiple systems

recovery_capacity_score.rationale: Composite recovery score from sleep quality and autonomic recovery

stress_adaptation_vs_maladaptation_class.rationale: Adaptive vs maladaptive classification from stress resilience trajectory

burnout_risk_trajectory.rationale: Risk trajectory from burnout symptom clusters and autonomic patterns

physiological_age_proxy.rationale: Biological age composite from multi-system aging biomarkers
